import React, { Fragment ,useState, useEffect,useRef} from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import { useReactToPrint } from 'react-to-print'; import { useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'; const Signup=()=>{ let [input,handleInput]=useState({name:'',email:'',password:'',repassword:''}); let [error,handleError]=useState({}); const handleSubmit=(e)=>{ e.preventDefault(); axios.post('http://localhost:3010/signup',input).then((res)=>{ console.log(); }) } return( Login

handleSubmit(e)} class="register-form" id="register-form">
handleInput({...input,name:e.target.value})} placeholder="Your Name"/>
handleInput({...input,email:e.target.value})} placeholder="Your Email"/>
handleInput({...input,password:e.target.value})} placeholder="Password"/>
handleInput({...input,repassword:e.target.value})} placeholder="Repeat your password"/>

) } export default Signup
